notes: Innovation leader in vegan biodesigned collagen. First and only biomimetic human type XXI collagen on market (HumaColl™21). Uses advanced Biodesigner AI™ platform and precision fermentation technology. Products are 100% vegan, animal-free, sustainable, and free from soy, gluten, allergens, parabens, phthalates. Suitable for skin care, body care, scalp care, hair care, grooming, color cosmetics, and after-sun care. Recommended use rate: 0.1%-1% active. Premium, cutting-edge vegan collagen alternative for clean beauty and sustainable brands.
